title: game crashes before reaching loading screen
body:
the problem started happening when i accidentally click spectate a game and press force quit to stop it after this every time i get into a game it just stops right before the loading screen and just says black i can still move the mouse but it just stays there and i can't do anything not even force quit i have to manually shut off my computer anyone know the solution?

ps I'm using a mac

replies.body: Thanks for the info and reaching out to get some help on this!  Black screens usually indicate a connection problem reaching the game server, so it can't download any assets.  You'll want to go through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot and streghten your connection to us.
